languages.text: {n}Капеллан почтительно кивает вам:{/n} "Пусть святой Друз обережет вас от хвори и неудач. Я удивлен увидеть здесь благородную особу вроде вас. Вы были знакомы с Дензом? Господином Беллардо, я хотел сказать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Капеллан почтительно кивает вам и произносит благословение святого Друза. Затем без перехода говорит:{/n} "Я удивлен увидеть здесь благородную особу вроде вас. Вы были знакомы с Дензом? Господином Беллардо, я хотел сказать".

languages.text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан почтительно кивает вам:{/n} "Пусть святой Друз обережет вас от хвори и неудач. Я удивлен увидеть здесь благородную особу вроде вас. Вы были знакомы с Дензом? Господином Беллардо, я хотел сказать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod and utters a blessing. Then, without any pause, he says,{/n} "I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

{n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod and utters a blessing. Then, without any pause, he says,{/n} "I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

{n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod and utters a blessing. Then, without any pause, he says,{/n} "I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

{n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod and utters a blessing. Then, without any pause, he says,{/n} "I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

{n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

languages.text: {n}牧师满怀敬意地向你点着头。{/n}“愿圣德鲁苏斯保佑你远离疾病与灾祸。没想到，会在这里见到像你这样尊贵的人。你认识丹兹吗？我是说，你认识贝拉多大师吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师满怀敬意地向你点着头。{/n}“愿圣德鲁苏斯保佑你远离疾病与灾祸。没想到，会在这里见到像你这样尊贵的人。你认识丹兹吗？我是说，你认识贝拉多大师吗？”

languages.text: {n}Capellán asiente con respeto.{/n} «Que san Drusus l{mf|e|a} proteja de la enfermedad y la desgracia. Me sorprende ver a una persona tan noble como usted aquí. ¿Conocía a Denz? Perdón, al maestro Bellardo».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán asiente con respeto.{/n} «Que san Drusus l{mf|e|a} proteja de la enfermedad y la desgracia. Me sorprende ver a una persona tan noble como usted aquí. ¿Conocía a Denz? Perdón, al maestro Bellardo».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は丁重にうなずく。{/n}「聖ドルススの加護により、病と不運から守られますよう。あなたのような高貴なお方とここで会うとは驚きです。デンズをご存知でしたか？マスター・ベラルドのことです」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は丁重にうなずく。{/n}「聖ドルススの加護により、病と不運から守られますよう。あなたのような高貴なお方とここで会うとは驚きです。デンズをご存知でしたか？マスター・ベラルドのことです」

languages.text: {n}Chapelain vous adresse un hochement de tête respectueux.{/n} « Que Saint Drusus vous protège de la maladie et du malheur. Je suis surpris de croiser quelqu'un d'aussi noble en ces lieux. Vous connaissiez Denz ? Je veux dire, maître Bellardo. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain vous adresse un hochement de tête respectueux.{/n} « Que Saint Drusus vous protège de la maladie et du malheur. Je suis surpris de croiser quelqu'un d'aussi noble en ces lieux. Vous connaissiez Denz ? Je veux dire, maître Bellardo. »

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester nickt dir respektvoll zu.{/n} "Möge der Hl. Drusus Euch vor Krankheit und Unglück bewahren. Ich bin überrascht, eine noble Person wie Euch hier zu sehen. Kanntet Ihr Denz? Ich meine, Meister Bellardo?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester nickt dir respektvoll zu.{/n} "Möge der Hl. Drusus Euch vor Krankheit und Unglück bewahren. Ich bin überrascht, eine noble Person wie Euch hier zu sehen. Kanntet Ihr Denz? Ich meine, Meister Bellardo?"

languages.text: {n}Papaz saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Aziz Drusus sizi hastalıktan ve beladan korusun. Sizin gibi soylu birini burada görmek beni şaşırttı doğrusu. Denz'i, yani Üstat Bellardo'yu tanır mıydınız?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a respectful nod.{/n} "May Saint Drusus protect you from illness and misfortune. I'm surprised to see a noble figure such as yourself here. Did you know Denz? I mean, Master Bellardo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz saygıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Aziz Drusus sizi hastalıktan ve beladan korusun. Burada sizin gibi soylu birini görmek ilginç oldu. Denz'i tanır mıydınız? Üstat Bellardo yani."
